title: Shamrocks Rout Clay-Battelle, 45-6
content: BARNESVILLE - After the first quarter ended it looked like it was going to be a defensive battle. Deadlocked at 0-0, the Barnesville offense picked up the ground attack and scored 20 second-quarter points as it went on to defeat Clay-Battelle, 45-6, Friday Night at Shamrock Stadium during Senior Night.
